bibl.title: Letter from B. J. Lloyd to Laura Armistead Carter, September 20, 1925

div1.p: Lloyd sends copies of an obituary he has drafted about Henry Rose Carter's career and his death.

div1.head: Letter from B. J. Lloyd to Laura Armistead Carter, September 20, 1925
div1.opener:
DR. B. J. LLOYD
3736 KANAWHA ST., N. W.
WASHINGTON, D. C.
Sept 20, 1925
Miss Laura Carter,
Westmoreland Apts.
Dear Laura:
div1.p:
Here are two copies of
the complete account of your
father's death and career as originally
drafted. I was very glad to be
with you during his last
moments.

closer.salute:
With kindest regards &
am
Very sincerely yours
